thread.title: Bill O’Reilly Responds to Russia Demanding Apology for Him Calling Putin a ‘Killer’
thread.title_full: Bill O’Reilly Responds to Russia Demanding Apology for Him Calling Putin a ‘Killer’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Bill O’Reilly Responds to Russia Demanding Apology for Him Calling Putin a ‘Killer’
text:
Bill O’Reilly Responds to Russia Demanding Apology for Him Calling Putin a ‘Killer’ by Josh Feldman | 8:09   video 
Bill O’Reilly responded tonight to the Kremlin demanding he apologize for calling Vladimir Putin a “killer.” 
The comment came as O’Reilly spoke to President Trump about Russia––wherein Trump made a much-talked-about remark about how America isn’t “innocent” when it comes to killing ––and a spokesman for the Kremlin said today , “We consider such words from the Fox TV company to be unacceptable and insulting, and honestly speaking, we would prefer to get an apology from such a respected TV company.” 
Anyone who knows O’Reilly well can guess what he thought of the complaint by the Kremlin, but you can watch his full response above, via Fox News. 
Watch above, via Fox News. 
[ image via screengrab ]
